seo.title: FAQs | CustomSoftware-Tech
seo.description: Answers about web development, custom software, SEO/SEM and digital marketing: timelines, pricing, process and support.

items.q: How long does a website take?
items.a: A basic site usually takes 2–4 weeks. Ecommerce or integrations take 6–10 weeks depending on scope.

items.q: Do you work on SEO from day one?
items.a: Yes. We implement technical SEO (metadata, indexing, performance) and content structure. Advanced SEO can be added.

items.q: Can you manage Google and Meta campaigns?
items.a: Yes. We set up, measure and optimize results-driven campaigns with periodic reports.

items.q: How do you price custom software?
items.a: We run discovery, define scope and estimate by modules. We propose MVPs to validate quickly and reduce risk.

items.q: Do you offer maintenance and support?
items.a: Yes. Support plans with improvements, security and monitoring. Also on-demand support.

cta.subtitle: Still have questions?
cta.title: Let’s talk about your project and the best path forward
